Tetonia is less than 2 hours from Yellowstone Park, 1 hour from Jackson Hole, 30 minutes from Grand Targhee Ski Resort, and just 10 minutes from Driggs, Idaho.

value: content=Our lodge and RV Park are centrally located in Southeast Idaho with a spectacular view of the Grand Teton Mountains. Showers, laundry, snacks and a TV lounge are only steps away from the RV Park. Hotel amenities include wireless internet, hot tub, pavilion, sand volleyball pit, fire pit, and a free continental breakfast with homemade cinnamon rolls.
